title: Ali's new bike purchase counts in GDP

content.prompt: Which of the following is most likely included in gross domestic product?

choices.label: Matt gives his secondhand bicycle to his brother.
Mike buys a share of stock in a bicycle firm.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
